OrgName.entry: DEVELOPMENT EDUCATION CENTRE, SOUTH YORKSHIRE - DEC(SY)

Desc.entry: Provides support and advice for teachers, lecturers, students, youth and community workers, campaigners and religious groups. Offers resources for sale or loan, artefacts to borrow, training sessions for educators, and opportunities to participate in curriculum development projects leading to publications. Promotes an understanding of world development and environmental issues and equal opportunities within education.
